sentences.sContent: Almost brutalist in presentation, the buttresses emulate medieval crenellations along the top of the structure, effectively emulating castles of yore.
sentences.sContent_eng: Almost brutalist in presentation, the buttresses emulate medieval crenellations along the top of the structure, effectively emulating castles of yore.
sentences.sCn: 几乎是粗野派的表达，沿着建筑顶部的扶壁模仿中世纪的锯齿状物，效仿昔日的城堡。

synos.tran: 仿真；模仿；尽力赶上；同…竞争

remMethod.val: 来自emul (竞争) + ate → 与…竞争的目的不是仿效， 而是超越
